transcript: Oh, it's kind of a planet on sneaking up on you, you know, over like a course of a week or so. They just take for granted that we're already set.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I was kind of planning on sneaking up on you, you know over like a course of a week or so. They just take for granted that we're already set.
